ingredients.item: 2 green peppers, deseeded and cut into small dice
½ x 180g pack Cooks’ Ingredients Pulled Ham Hock
395g can essential Waitrose Red Kidney Beans In Chilli Sauce

instructions.step: Put the onion, peppers and stock in a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer. Cover with a lid and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the ham hock, sweetcorn, red kidney beans and half the coriander. Return to a gentle simmer and cook, covered, for a further 10 minutes.

Place the remaining coriander, radishes and avocado in 3 separate serving dishes. Drizzle the lime juice over the avocado. Ladle the posole (Mexican-style stew) into shallow serving dishes and serve with the garnishes for stirring in.
